title: Yi needs to be somewhat nerfed (When fed his damage is out of control)
body:
Today I was in a game and witnessed a Yi who was able to Q our teams champs and kill us. 1 Q and we were dead. He continuously 1 shot Q'd us. In 1 second he did around 2000 damage to a kalista's health. It was not fun at all and I'd say all my team mates were pissed of as well. I do get that there are champs who can stop his Q by silencing or stop his movement speed by slowing him but the reaction time needed for someone to press the button to silence or snare Yi is longer then a Yi's reaction time to Q. His auto attacks with attack speed could 1-3 shot champs with 2000+ health as well.
I think that Yi should be nerfed in a way to make it easier to stop his Q or just him in general because when he is fed it's not fun at all.

(Yes I get that I am unranked ..... Blah, blah, blah but a champ shouldn't be able to do this. It's just plain stupid.)

I had a game in Nemesis draft as Yi, laning. I don't play Yi. I am terrible at Yi somehow.
I fed hard for 20 minutes.
I carried after that.
I know its Nemesis Draft and not the best indicator, but I think my anecdote still has a bit of insight to offer. You can argue that people didn't know how to play their champs... but neither did I until half of the game was done.

Any (carry) champion when fed has bullsht damage. A fed Katarina killed me with 2300 HP  0.31 seconds.

Anything fed is bullsht.

What you need to do to stop them is have a plan, either tell the person with exhaust to be ready with it, or CC him so he dies faster or something. Don't just mindlessly group mid, get poked down slightly then allow Yi to Ult+Q in and kill your team for free (like happens in most games).

I do agree that when a Fiora/Yi can fed is slightly worse since they can become untargetable when doing a lot of their damage.
